titles.title: Abolish Child Trafficking Act
PACT Act
To amend the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to direct the Secretary of State to submit reports to Congress on child protection compacts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/9/2014--Introduced. Partnering to Abolish Child Trafficking Act or the PACT Act - Amends the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to direct the Secretary of State to report annually to Congress regarding: (1) child protection compacts, (2) countries with which the United States may enter into a child protection compact, and (3) related assistance.
